data.title: Buckeye Spotlight – Trevor Thompson, Men’s Basketball – Ohio State Buckeyes
data.meta_description: Feb. 8, 2016 Trevor Thompson is in his second season with the Ohio State basketball team and first on the court after sitting out a season after his transfer...
data.text:
Feb. 8, 2016

Trevor Thompson is in his second season with the Ohio State basketball team and first on the court after sitting out a season after his transfer from Virginia Tech. The Indianapolis native has appeared in 24 games, starting 17, in his redshirt sophomore season. Thompson has average 5.6 points and 4.9 rebounds while tallying three double-doubles on the season.

Student Life

Do you prefer Oval Beach in the Fall or Spring (or maybe the Winter)? – Fall

Where is the best place to sit for lectures? – Back because I’m so tall and can see over everybody

Most underrated place to study on campus – My room

Why did you choose to major in sport industry? – Because I have an interest in sports and coaching

If you were the University President for a day, what would you do? – Give us the day off

Describe your first day as a student at The Ohio State University? – Very confusing. I didn’t know where I was going and felt like a lost puppy.

Popular Culture

Favorite TV show – Spongebob Squarepants

Favorite movie – Star Wars

Favorite book and/or magazine – Sports Illustrated

Favorite celebrity – DJ Khaled because of his snapchats

Favorite singer or musical group – Drake

Last concert I attended was – Young Thug

Sports

Favorite pro sports team – Los Angeles Lakers

Favorite athlete – My dad

The athlete I would most like to compete against – Kevin Durant

Favorite athletic memory – When we beat Kentucky in Barclays Center and celebrating the win after

Team you’re most looking forward to competing against – Michigan State

Pre-game/match superstition/Pre-game/match ritual – I watch Star Wars

What is your top skill? What skill do you need to improve? – My top skill is my versatility and my IQ and I need to improve on not relaxing

Travel Most interesting place I’ve visited – Cancun

Place I would like to visit – Africa

Food

Favorite home cooked meal – Curry

Favorite snack food – Peanut butter and jelly
